sentence.text: Ectopically injected human cancer cell lines develop into tumors in SCID attachment of GPI anchor to protein, thus providing a human-sized in vivo model for evaluating imaging methods to improve cancer detection and therapeutic research and development.

entity.text: attachment of GPI anchor to protein

sentence.text: Humanization of SCID attachment of GPI anchor to protein would thus provide a valuable model system for researchers to study interactions between human tumor and human immune cells.

entity.text: attachment of GPI anchor to protein
